2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
2fa.description: A two-factor authentication code is required for {username}. Please check your authenticator app or email and enter the code below.

data_description.ha_inform_rate: How often to update sensors in Home Assistant (2-600 seconds). Lower values = more responsive but higher system load and DB writes.
data_description.three_phase: Enable for three phase electrical setups.
data_description.allow_breaker_control: When enabled, HA will create switch entities allowing you to trip/reset breakers. When disabled, breakers are only treated as sensors.
data_description.log_warnings: Log integration crashes or web errors.
data_description.log_data_warnings: Log warnings of data inconsistencies from Leviton (spikes/resets).
data_description.log_all_raw: Log all data provided via WebSocket.
data_description.enable_specific_logging: Log any specified field. Field names can be found by briefly enabling 'Log Full WebSocket Data'.
data_description.log_fields: To find field names, enable 'Log Full WebSocket Data' and check Home Assistant logs. Enter above as comma separated.
